title: Government revenue and spending in Spain 2024
summary: You are viewing a chart of multi-line type with 2 lines denoting Revenue, and Spending. The y axis indicates the Revenue / Spending in billion euros and the x axis indicates Year.
Overall Revenue, and Spending are gradually increasing,  throughout the Year
The ranking of the lines from topmost to botommmost is as follows: 1. Spending, and lastly, 2. Revenue.
Overall across the Year, Spending mostly maintained the highest Revenue / Spending in billion euros when compared to others with a mean value of 519.58, and it peaked at 2024.
Revenue mostly had the least Revenue / Spending in billion euros with a mean value of 484.07, which peaked at 2024 with a value of 571.76.
